description: Program name, eg TCGA or TARGET
name: program_name

description: ID of the Project -- e.g. TCGA-BRCA, TARGET-AML, etc.
name: project_id

description: Submitter identifier, eg HCC1954, TCGA-ZX-AA5X, etc
name: case_barcode

description: Unique GDC identifier for this sample (corresponds to the sample_barcode), eg a1ec9279-c1a6-4e58-97ed-9ec1f36187c5  --  this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
name: sample_gdc_id

description: Two-digit sample_type code which forms part of the sample barcode eg. 01,11,06, etc.
name: sample_type

description: The longer name of the sample type; eg. Primary Tumor, Recurrent Tumor, etc.
name: sample_type_name

description: Unique GDC identifier for this portion (corresponds to the portion_barcode), eg 12ab0051-32d1-4fc2-8abe-645b54a9d664 -- this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
name: portion_gdc_id

description: Unique GDC identifier for this slide (corresponds to the slide_barcode), eg 52aff37e-64c6-48b8-89ad-0a440a131603 -- this can be used to access more information from the GDC data portal
name: slide_gdc_id
